message.content:
{"id": "7330", 
 "title": "Bug 7330: Make more actions available on text selection", 
 "description": "I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions seem to be distributed based on personal preference. This should be changed to make it clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. While not all actions need to be in the context menu, they should all be reachable from the editor. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view.", 
 "OB": "The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not available in the context menu when selecting text.", 
 "EB": "The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' should be available in the context menu when selecting text.", 
 "SR": "Ensure that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is accessible via the Edit menu when text is selected."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '7330', 'title': 'Bug 7330Make more actions available on text selection', 'description': 'Bug 7330Make more actions available on text selection I could not find the action "Add Javadoc Comment" until I switched to theOutline view. in the Edit (or some other global) menuI think currently we distribute the actions on a personal taste basis. Thisshould be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the contextmenu and some are not (OKnot all need to be in the context menu but all mustbe reachable from the editor e.g. It is not acceptable to forceusers to switch the view. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'via Edit menu). '}
